column2: geom_line(aes(x = t, y = X1 + 1.96*X1.1), linetype = "dashed", color = "red", size = 0.8) +
geom_line(aes(x = t, y = X1 - 1.96*X1.1), linetype = "dashed", color = "red", size = 0.8) +
geom_line(aes(x = t, y = X1), color = "orange", size = 1) +
ggtitle("Local level trend estimated state with 95% CI") +
